title: The Thread makers
creator_credit: John Chittock, James Archibald and James Archibald and Associates
brief_description: Illustrates the nature of J. & B. Coats’ activities as makers and marketeers of thread of all types for every variety of use. Filmed in India, Austria, Spain, England and Scotland with a strong emphasis on the human interest. The development of synthetic thread, requiring new techniques and processes, is shown to be a likely prospect for the future
